LanguageData.Apparel_Ling_Dark_I.label: Energy Shield - Candle Shadow
LanguageData.Apparel_Ling_Dark_I.description: The first game of the Shadow Energy Shield has a low energy cap and low recovery speed, is equipped with a high-efficiency blurr, equipped with a certain chance to directly ignore the opponent's attack, this is a melee specialized shield, which will reduce less energy when taking melee damage
LanguageData.Apparel_Ling_Dark_II.label: Energy Shield - Moon Shadow
LanguageData.Apparel_Ling_Dark_II.description: The second game of the Shadow Energy Shield, with a lower energy cap and slightly lower recovery speed, is equipped with an efficient blurr equipped with a certain chance to directly ignore the opponent's attack, this is a melee special shield, which will reduce less energy when taking melee damage
